Package etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILinkDiscovery
    This interface is actually not an interface, because there's no class that implements this interface.
    ILinkDiscoveryListener
    The user classes of ILinkDiscoveryService should implement this interface.
    ILinkDiscoveryService
    This interface is used to define a service that OFMLinkDiscovery should implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ILinkDiscoveryListener.LDUpdate
    Actual update notification.
    Link
    This class represents a Link.
    LinkInfo  
    Links
    Model of the module OFMLinkDiscovery
    NodePortTuple
    A NodePortTuple is similar to a SwitchPortTuple but it only stores IDs instead of references to the actual objects.
    OFMLinkDiscovery
    Link Discovery Module.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ILinkDiscovery.LinkType
    This enum defines the type of each link.
    ILinkDiscovery.SwitchType Deprecated 
    ILinkDiscoveryListener.UpdateOperation
    Represents the type of the update.
